TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MetadataExchangeBindings extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Used to create system-provided bindings for WS-Transfer metadata exchange using the contract.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeBindings> methods and properties to create system-provided bindings to support WS-Transfer GET metadata exchanges. For more information and examples, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md).
See the individual members for details about the composition of the bindings they return.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding CreateMexHttpBinding() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeBindings.CreateMexHttpBinding%2A> method to return a binding that supports most metadata requests.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding CreateMexHttpsBinding() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a that supports transport-level security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExchangeBindings.CreateMexHttpsBinding%2A> method to return a binding that can be secured at the transport level using certificates. For more information about configuring and using such a metadata endpoint, see [How to: Configure a Custom WS-Metadata Exchange Binding](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-configure-a-custom-ws-metadata-exchange-binding.md), [How to: Retrieve Metadata Over a non-MEX Binding](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-retrieve-metadata-over-a-non-mex-binding.md), and the sample [Custom Secure Metadata Endpoint](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/custom-secure-metadata-endpoint.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding CreateMexNamedPipeBinding() cil managed
.method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding CreateMexTcpBinding() cil managed
